contentModel.bodyText:
Go to the Users page to begin the demo.

Demo app to show Angular Best Practices for large scale web applications.

This version uses Angular 20 and NgRx SignalStore.

CODE FEATURES:

  • 100% Reactive Components, No Services, No Logic, No State.
  • No Modules, 100% standalone.
  • State Management using SignalStore.
  • Facade Pattern, store is decoupled from components, see facade services.
  • CMS Content Management, all content is provided by reusable content component.
  • Content can use embedded HTML.
  • Performance Optimized, all dynamic data are Signals.
  • All components have Change Detection On Push.
  • CSS Global Styles, organized by feature, uses partials and variables.
  • Feature Based Directory Structure, files and folders organized by dependency.
  • Namespace Naming Convention, public elements, objects and files have common unique prefix.
  • HTML templates use new Control Flow syntax.
  • Services use new inject syntax.
  • All file and class names follow new Angular 20 Naming Convention.
  • All inputs use InputSignal.
  • ContentChild uses Signals.
  • Jest unit testing with 100% coverage.
